title: Taking less asthma medicine can be done safely with guidance Mayo Clinic study says (Mayo ...
text: ( Source : Mayo Foundation for Medical Education and Research Inc) PHOENIX - Stepping down asthma medicines can be done safely and at less cost for patients says a new Mayo Clinic study published this week in The Journal of Allergy and
